results.content: Fernando is a knowledgeable teacher and explanations are clear and concise. Good stuff for a complete PHP beginner. Too bad that he promised a PHP object-oriented project that he has not fulfilled yet.
results.content_html: Fernando is a knowledgeable teacher and explanations are clear and concise. Good stuff for a complete PHP beginner. Too bad that he promised a PHP object-oriented project that he has not fulfilled yet.

results.content:
I liked the course, though it is not finished at the moment, some new materials are in the way according to the author.
It is not complex regarding terms and Fernando gives lectures in an easy and funny manner. Thx!

results.content: Excellent Course. Looking forward for more PHP related course specially Laravel.

results.content: the very obvious joy of the instructor during the sql sections are the cherry on top of a well structured course. really enjoying it.
